verses.roman:
svayaṁ-bhagavānera karma nahe bhāra-haraṇa
sthiti-kartā viṣṇu karena jagat-pālana

synonyms: svayam-bhagavānera—of the original Supreme Personality of Godhead; karma—the business; nahe—is not; bhāra-haraṇa—taking away the burden; sthiti-kartā—the maintainer; viṣṇu—Lord Viṣṇu; karena—does; jagat-pālana—protection of the universe.
translation: To take away this burden, however, is not the work of the Supreme Personality of Godhead. The maintainer, Lord Viṣṇu, is the one who protects the universe.
